title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2257/98 of 20 October 1998 laying down special measures derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 3719/88 as regards fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2257/98 of 20 October 1998 laying down special measures derogating from Regulation (EEC) No 3719/88 as regards fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Notwithstanding Article 33 of Regulation (EEC) No 3719/88, the securities relating to export licences for fruit and vegetables with advance fixing of the refund on which Russia is one of the stipulated destinations, which were valid on 1 September 1998 and which were or are returned to the issuing body no later than 31 December 1998, shall be released in full for the quantities not exported.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 October 1998.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
